def.dt: :a drawing in a newspaper or magazine intended as a humorous comment on something a political cartoon
:a series of drawings that tell a story :comic strip She enjoys reading the cartoons in the Sunday paper.
:a film or television show made by photographing a series of drawings :an animated film or television show The kids are watching cartoons. a cartoon character
:a design, drawing, or painting made by an artist as a model for the finished work
